content: There seems to be more geeks and nerds than normies on this site, which is great. The small user base is steadily growing, even if slowly. I'd like to see better facilities to be able to eliminate profiles I'm not interested in. In the constructive criticism department I'd like to suggest creating better reporting facilities for things like duplicate accounts, which there are a number of. But other than that I'm rooting for this app and hope it gets better and gains even more members, even though ultimately I'd like to get the hell out of there as fast as possible, but not alone of course. :-)

content: A lot of the website, and emails you receive, are in German, and as such most of the userbase appear from there. In terms of English-speaking users there aren't many at all, but hopefully this will increase to widen the app's popularity and use to those outside of the European mainland. The search feature could do with work as it frequently lists 0 people within a location search, even though it will also tell me that there are people in my history/bookmarked page that would fit that search as it tells you the distance on the bookmarked page. The compatibility feature may not be working right as users are either 84% or 100% compatible to me, with no other ratings ever seen. You can use both the app, and the website, to find people. To speak you do need to pay with its own in-app currency of "credits" but you can receive enough to speak to a few people by giving the app an honest rating and then emailing them, so that can be a good way to get you started and see if you wish to venture further into the app. I hope the work continues in its development as it has a very solid premise, and the foundations are present to make this a pleasant experience for people to find fellow gaming (and other geeky hobbies) partners. Is an overall good experience so far.
replyContent: Hello, thank you for your great feedback. Please make sure to check out our FAQ, since a few of your points are already explained there, e.g. match making, location based search etc. Also, free free to contact support if you need more help, we would love to answer it but we are limited by this comment section of the app. Thank you, Admin-Team
